home.title: Amare.Wedding - Wedding Planning Made Easy
home.description: The all-in-one wedding planning platform. Manage guests, track RSVPs, plan events, and organize your perfect day. Start planning for free!
home.keywords: wedding planning, wedding organizer, guest management, RSVP tracking, wedding events, wedding budget, free wedding planner

demo.title: Demo Wedding - Experience Amare.Wedding
demo.description: Explore our wedding planning platform with a live demo. See how easy it is to manage guests, track RSVPs, and plan your wedding events.
demo.keywords: wedding planner demo, wedding app demo, try wedding planner, wedding planning software

pricing.title: Pricing Plans - Amare.Wedding
pricing.description: Choose the perfect plan for your wedding. Start free with basic features or upgrade for unlimited guests, events, and premium features.
pricing.keywords: wedding planner pricing, wedding app cost, wedding planning subscription, free wedding planner

login.title: Login - Amare.Wedding
login.description: Sign in to your Amare.Wedding account to continue planning your perfect wedding day.

register.title: Create Account - Amare.Wedding
register.description: Create your free Amare.Wedding account and start planning your perfect wedding today. Easy setup, powerful features.

rsvp.title: RSVP - {{weddingTitle}}
rsvp.description: You're invited! Please let us know if you can attend {{weddingTitle}}.

dashboard.title: Dashboard - Amare.Wedding
dashboard.description: Manage your wedding planning from your personal dashboard. Track guests, events, and budget all in one place.

guests.title: Guest Management - Amare.Wedding
guests.description: Manage your wedding guest list. Add guests, track RSVPs, and send invitations easily.

events.title: Events - Amare.Wedding
events.description: Plan and organize all your wedding events. From ceremony to reception, keep everything organized.

expenses.title: Budget Tracker - Amare.Wedding
expenses.description: Track your wedding expenses and stay on budget. Organize costs by category and monitor your spending.
